name: Giftify
author: Chakramani Joshi

sections.description:
Giftify is a versatile WooCommerce extension that enhances your store with customizable features like custom product options, additional fee types, and new settings tabs. It also allows customers to add personalized messages along with their products during checkout, providing a more personalized shopping experience. This plugin is designed to be developer-friendly, allowing for easy extension and customization through filters and actions. Whether you need to add custom select options, repeater fields, or tab content, Giftify provides the flexibility to tailor your WooCommerce store to your specific needs. Ideal for developers looking to create a more dynamic and personalized shopping experience.

1. Download the Plugin:

  • Obtain the Giftify plugin ZIP file from the source where it’s distributed.

2. Install the Plugin:

  • Go to your WordPress dashboard.
  • Navigate to Plugins > Add New.
  • Click on the Upload Plugin button at the top.
  • Choose the Giftify plugin ZIP file and click Install Now.

3. Activate the Plugin:

  • Once installed, click Activate Plugin to enable Giftify on your site.

4. Configure the Plugin:

  • After activation, go to the Giftify settings in the WooCommerce section of your WordPress dashboard.
  • Configure the options, such as custom product options, fees, and any additional settings provided by the plugin.

5. Customize (Optional):

  • Developers can extend Giftify by using the available filters and actions to add custom select options, repeater fields, fee types, or custom tabs.

6. Test the Plugin:

  • Add a product to your WooCommerce store, go through the checkout process, and ensure that all Giftify features (like custom messages with products) are functioning as expected.
sections.faq:
Giftify FAQ

Q1: What does Giftify add to WooCommerce?

A: Giftify enhances WooCommerce by adding custom product options, additional fee types, settings tabs, and the ability for customers to add personalized messages with their products during checkout.

Q2: How can I add custom options to Giftify fields?

A: You can use the provided filters, such as giftify_select_options and giftify_fee_type_options, to add custom options to existing fields. Refer to the developer documentation for specific code examples.

Q3: Can I add new tabs to the Giftify settings page?

A: Yes, you can use the giftify_additional_tabs filter to add new tabs, and the giftify_tab_content_{tab_id} action to define the content for those tabs.

Q4: How do I enable customers to add a message with their product?

A: Giftify includes a feature that allows customers to add a personalized message with their product during checkout. Ensure this feature is enabled in the plugin settings.

Q5: Is Giftify developer-friendly?

A: Absolutely! Giftify is built with developers in mind, offering various hooks, filters, and actions to extend and customize the plugin’s functionality.

Q6: Can Giftify be customized for specific needs?

A: Yes, Giftify is highly customizable. Developers can use the plugin’s filters and actions to tailor its features to specific requirements.

Q7: How do I update Giftify?

A: You can update Giftify like any other WordPress plugin, either through the WordPress dashboard or by manually uploading the latest version.

Q8: Is there support available for Giftify?

A: Yes, support is available. You can refer to the plugin documentation or contact the plugin’s support team for assistance.

Q9: Will Giftify work with any WooCommerce theme?

A: Giftify is designed to work seamlessly with most WooCommerce-compatible themes. However, it’s always recommended to test the plugin with your specific theme.

Q10: How do I uninstall Giftify?

A: To uninstall Giftify, simply deactivate and delete the plugin from the WordPress Plugins section. Be aware that uninstalling may remove any custom settings or data associated with the plugin.
